Reviews.Title: fixed the problem
Reviews.Author: Rene Allamby
Reviews.Content: I replaced the old one and did not have to drill any holes, fitted perfectly in the door.  Alarm works like a champ

Reviews.Title: Excellent Replacement
Reviews.Author: BA
Reviews.Content: Everything was going well on my door replacement project ...until I removed the door jamb and noticed that I'd forgotten to disconnect the door sensor contact. The contact was destroyed, and I didn't want to cough up $100+ to have the security company install a replacement. So, I checked around for a replacement and came across this highly-rated alternative.The replacement is exactly the same size as the original, so it fit perfectly in the existing hole. The wire leads are a forgiving length, just in case the ends of the wires coming from the system were somehow damaged. To install this contact, I soldered the wires from the contact to the system wires, and I used heat shrink tubing to cover the soldered wire. All is back to normal.

Reviews.Title: perfect replacement part
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: needed a replacement lost part - security system would not work properly without it.  this was a perfect fit -

Reviews.Title: Fantastic As Always
Reviews.Author: Luis G Pacheco
Reviews.Content: I have installed these on two separate houses that are have hardwired alarm systems. They work flawlessly and all you need to install them is a 3/8" drill bit.

Reviews.Title: Great for the DIYer
Reviews.Author: Todd
Reviews.Content: A whole lot more dough if you have to pay someone to come out. We replaced an exterior door and had to hook up the alarm sensor. This did the trick.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Guillermo Molla
Reviews.Content: worked perfect with ADT system. Great savings, saved over $100.00 dollars very easy to install, shipped on time, will buy again from Honeywell Ademco.

Reviews.Title: Great Product! Fast Delivery.
Reviews.Author: Eric Y. Feibelman
Reviews.Content: Worked like a charm. No problems whatsoever! Love it! It installed quickly and the contact works with the door even with a nice gap at the top of the door.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Replacement
Reviews.Author: Thomas D. Adams
Reviews.Content: Replaced an exterior door and forgot all about the contact switch in the jamb until after freeing the door frame with a sawzall. Oops! This switch worked perfectly. The wire leads were more than adequate and it has been working fine for a couple months now. I ordered two just to make sure I had a working unit, but had no issues with the first one.

Reviews.Title: Simple and effective
Reviews.Author: David R Reed Jr
Reviews.Content: These magnetic reed switches work as advertised. The quality is great, ready to go easy to work with and strong.

Reviews.Title: A okay
Reviews.Author: Valley of The Sun "SUNSHINE"
Reviews.Content: Ordered this stubby recessed control to replace those in door that were damaged. They are what I needed and function & fit as the original ones did. Pleased with switches & recommend them.

Reviews.Title: It worked great.
Reviews.Author: R. E. Wernimont "Ralph"
Reviews.Content: I needed these items on my security system and they were easy to install. I think they were normally open contacts.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Penny Noblett
Reviews.Content: Worked great with ADT system. Was going to cost over $50.00 for ADt to come out and replace the one broken connector. But was able to replace it myself for under $10.00.

Reviews.Title: Ademco Recessed Contact
Reviews.Author: TDM
Reviews.Content: Pretty fast shipping and the unit was exactly as described.  I used this to replace a previous sensor which became damaged with a new door install.This was simple to install and popped right in.  Great product.

Reviews.Title: Just needed some replacements.
Reviews.Author: Robert Leombruno "Bruno"
Reviews.Content: These suckers are hard to find locally as Lowes or Home Depot doesn't stock them anymore so I'm told. And if you find them online, they are almost three times the cost plus shipping. As always, Amazon comes thru cheaper and Free shipping. Oh, and why did I buy some more. Well I had replaced an exit garage door that had no window with one that has a window. I wanted to salvage the old door for our barn so I didn't try to remove the old magnet contact as it was there for over 13 years from the builder.

Reviews.Title: Works like it should
Reviews.Author: Square Head
Reviews.Content: I replaced a door, and needed a new magnet and switch.  This works perfectly.  I would buy this switch again.

Reviews.Title: Adding contacts to complete security zones
Reviews.Author: Jules
Reviews.Content: These were ordered to install in an attic door so it could be added to our security system zone.These were easy to install, worked well and we were up and running in less than half an hour (we had preexisting wiring to the door)

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Tracy-Student
Reviews.Content: When our contractor cut the original with a saw we thought we were stuck with bypassing that zone.  This contact fixed the problem.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: BeEdwards
Reviews.Content: These contacts worked perfectly. They were exactly as described and arrived on time. You must however have knowledge of electrical components to install them.

Reviews.Title: Worked as expected
Reviews.Author: Zeke
Reviews.Content: I was fixing a contact that didn't work so I ordered these ones. After installation they work as I would expect them.

ProductInfo.Features:
1 in. long magnet, it is ideal for casement windows, sliding windows and thin frame applications
More powerful Alnico 8 magnet for up to 7/16 in. (11mm) gap
1 foot zip cord leads are standard
Monitors the opening and closure of doors and windows
Can be added to a wireless home security system with video surveillance cameras and more
ProductInfo.Name: 951WG-WH - Ademco 3/8 in. Stubby Recessed Contact
